sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import logo from "../assets/logo_transparent.png"; import "../css/Home.css"; import GitHub from "../assets/GitHub_Logo_White.png"; import { Input, Button } from "@material-ui/core"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { v1 as uuid } from "uuid"; const Home = (props) => { const { user } = useSelector((state) => ({ ...state })); useEffect(() => { if (user && user.token) props.history.push("/mainpage"); }, [user]); const [url, setURL] = useState(""); const create = () => { if (url !== "") { props.history.push(`${url}`); } else { const id = uuid(); props.history.push(`/room/${id}`); } }; return ( <>

Start or join a meeting

setURL(e.target.value)} />

Why choose RemoteSports?

Create Free Account!

100% Free Account

Create an free account and start your very own meeting. Connect to multiple people.

Multi Cameras

Multi Camera

Automatically cycle through all the users cameras too see if everyone is perfoming the exercise correctly.

Chat and Share Files

Chat and Share Files

Chat and Share Big Files with your meeting mates.

Calendar

You will never forget!

Never fail your meeting! Automatically send out invites to registered users to join your meeting/class. It will also be on your Calendar.

RemoteSports Team

  • HÉLDER PIMENTA GONÇALVES
  • HUGO PEREIRA

    • Want to contribute? Great!

    ©{new Date().getFullYear()} RemoteSports |{" "} Instituto Politénico de Viana Do Castelo

    ); }; export default Home;
